ca.uhn.fhir.validation

Class FhirValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.fhir.validation.FhirValidator

  • public class FhirValidator
extends Object
    Resource validator, which checks resources for compliance against various validation schemes (schemas, schematrons, etc.)

    To obtain a resource validator, call FhirContext.newValidator()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FhirValidator(FhirContext theFhirContext)
      Constructor (this should not be called directly, but rather FhirContext.newValidator() should be called to obtain an instance of FhirValidator)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isValidateAgainstStandardSchema()
      Should the validator validate the resource against the base schema (the schema provided with the FHIR distribution itself)
      boolean isValidateAgainstStandardSchematron()
      Should the validator validate the resource against the base schema (the schema provided with the FHIR distribution itself)
      void setValidateAgainstStandardSchema(boolean theValidateAgainstStandardSchema)
      Should the validator validate the resource against the base schema (the schema provided with the FHIR distribution itself)
      void setValidateAgainstStandardSchematron(boolean theValidateAgainstStandardSchematron)
      Should the validator validate the resource against the base schematron (the schematron provided with the FHIR distribution itself)
      void validate(Bundle theBundle)
      Validates a bundle instance, throwing a ValidationFailureException if the validation fails.
      void validate(IResource theResource)
      Validates a resource instance, throwing a ValidationFailureException if the validation fails

      • validate

        public void validate(Bundle theBundle)
        Validates a bundle instance, throwing a ValidationFailureException if the validation fails. This validation includes validation of all resources in the bundle.
        Parameters:
        theResource - The resource to validate
        Throws:
        ValidationFailureException - If the validation fails

      • validate

        public void validate(IResource theResource)
              throws ValidationFailureException
        Validates a resource instance, throwing a ValidationFailureException if the validation fails
        Parameters:
        theResource - The resource to validate
        Throws:
        ValidationFailureException - If the validation fails
